Text: Re Kelloggs Cc Further to Saras email below can you let me know when you will be in a position to send me documents used in your ISDA negotiations with the US Kellog entitiy Many thanks Deepak Forwarded by Deepak SitlaniLONECT on Sara Shackleton To Deepak CT Michael Khajeh CT cc Tana CT Subject Re Kelloggs ENA sent execution copies of the ISDA to Kellogg Company on April By copy of this email I ask that you touch base with Tana Jones in Houston who will verify the status of ENAs ISDA with Kellogg Company and send you copies of our documents for use in your negotiations Let me know if you have any questions Sara Deepak Sitlani AM To Sara CT cc Martin CT Paul NRON Edmund CT Michael Khajeh CT Subject Kelloggs Sara Paul Radous asked me to get in touch with you in connection with a proposed ISDA Master Agreement with Kellog Supply Services Europe Limited I should be grateful if you would send me by email all documents relating to the ISDA recently executed between ENA and Kellogs as Paul would like us to use similar provisions In passing I should point out that both I and my colleague Michael KhajehNoori will be dealing with this matter I am in the office on Mondays and Tuesdays and Michael is in the office on Thursdays and Fridays I should therefore be grateful if you would address any emails to both of us we can both be contacted on the same extension If you have any questions please let me know With kind regards Deepak Paul will you be preparing a credit worksheet for this entity Forwarded by Deepak SitlaniLONECT on Edmund Cooper To Deepak CT Michael CT cc Subject Kelloggs FYI Forwarded by Edmund CooperLONECT on PM Martin Holmes PM To Paul NRON cc Edmund CT Subject Kelloggs Paul We have recently concluded an ISDA with The Kellogg Company in the USA Now their European entity Kellogg Supply Services Europe Limited of The Kellogg Building Talbot Road Manchester M PU UK would like to see an ISDA Mastera and Schedule Can you look at this entity from a credit point of view please I do not have separate financials for them but if you need them will ask for a latest set Thanks Martin Holmes PS Did you get the Sappi International financials And have you made any progress with Rottneros Thanks MH London x

Re Kelloggs Cc looking for the ISDA Schedule Paragraph to the Credit Support Annex and the Enron and Kellog guarantees If at all possible it would be ideal if you could email me the execution versions of these docs Alternatively please fax them my fax no is Many thanks for your help Regards Deepak From Tana Jones on CDT To Deepak CT cc Subject Re Kelloggs The Kellogg ISDA Agreement has been signed but it is somewhat long Would you like me to fax it to you if so what is your fax no or would you like me to fedex it to you

Re KelloggsApologies I have given you my telephone number My fax number is Deepak Forwarded by Deepak SitlaniLONECT on Deepak Sitlani To Tana CT cc Michael Khajeh CT Subject Re Kelloggs I am looking for the ISDA Schedule Paragraph to the Credit Support Annex and the Enron and Kellog guarantees If at all possible it would be ideal if you could email me the execution versions of these docs Alternatively please fax them my fax no is Many thanks for your help Regards Deepak From Tana Jones on CDT To Deepak CT cc Subject Re Kelloggs The Kellogg ISDA Agreement has been signed but it is somewhat long Would you like me to fax it to you if so what is your fax no or would you like me to fedex it to you

Re Kelloggs Cc I do not seem to have received the documentation referred to in my email below I should be grateful if you would email the execution versions both to me and Michael KhajehNoori so that we can mirror the documentation for the purposes of negotiating a new ISDA with Kelloggs UK entity Alternatively if it is not possible to email them please fax them to me If you have any questions please let me know In the meantime many thanks for your help Regards Deepak Forwarded by Deepak SitlaniLONECT on Deepak Sitlani To Tana CT cc Michael Khajeh CT Subject Re Kelloggs I am looking for the ISDA Schedule Paragraph to the Credit Support Annex and the Enron and Kellog guarantees If at all possible it would be ideal if you could email me the execution versions of these docs Alternatively please fax them my fax no is Many thanks for your help Regards Deepak From Tana Jones on CDT To Deepak CT cc Subject Re Kelloggs The Kellogg ISDA Agreement has been signed but it is somewhat long Would you like me to fax it to you if so what is your fax no or would you like me to fedex it to you

Re Kelloggs Cc I do not seem to have received the documentation referred to in my email below I should be grateful if you would email the execution versions both to me and Michael KhajehNoori so that we can mirror the documentation for the purposes of negotiating a new ISDA with Kelloggs UK entity Alternatively if it is not possible to email them please fax them to me If you have any questions please let me know In the meantime many thanks for your help Regards Deepak Forwarded by Deepak SitlaniLONECT on Deepak Sitlani To Tana CT cc Michael Khajeh CT Subject Re Kelloggs I am looking for the ISDA Schedule Paragraph to the Credit Support Annex and the Enron and Kellog guarantees If at all possible it would be ideal if you could email me the execution versions of these docs Alternatively please fax them my fax no is Many thanks for your help Regards Deepak From Tana Jones on CDT To Deepak CT cc Subject Re Kelloggs The Kellogg ISDA Agreement has been signed but it is somewhat long Would you like me to fax it to you if so what is your fax no or would you like me to fedex it to you

SITA Cc As requested I chased SITA again this afternoon They have not yet appointed local counsel as the legal department is currently busy acquiring an Australian subsidiary I will chase again next week Regards Deepak Forwarded by Deepak SitlaniLONECT on Deepak Sitlani To Sara CT cc Michael CT Edmund CT Michael Khajeh CT Subject SITA Sara I refer to our recent conversation relating to the progress of ISDA negotiations with the above counterparty I have just spoken to Carine Lavergne at SITA She informs me that SITA does not feel adequately equipped or informed to progress the negotiations internally and therefore intends to appoint external counsel I urged her to do this as soon as possible Despite this intended appointment she assured me that SITA wishes to enter into the ISDA as soon as possible and is keen to keep negotiations to a minimum Either I or Michael KhajehNoori will keep you updated as to the progress For your information I also attach a status report with respect to the counterparties with whom Michael and I are currently negotiating Let me know if you need anything else Regards Deepak
